name: MitziFirstTimeTalk
_source: s;Simon;Lord Morrissey has agreed to open his archives to you.|That was no small request, so I hope you'll-
s;Mitzi;Learn something useful? I certainly will.
s;Mitzi;As will you, if I have my way.
s;Mitzi;Purely for your benefit.{w} Archives often contain old tomes,|founts of knowledge rarely remembered today.|Any of your men who study them will be certain to learn new skills.
s;Simon;I'm grateful for your help, though I'm afraid only a few can read.|Vincent and Juliet are illiterate, and Luther...{w} struggles with his letters.
s;Mitzi;On Thanatos, then read it to them!|Baby them, if you must.|Though I will need time, I promise dividends.
